desc:
YOHITRIP IS A ONE-STEP B2B DIRECT BOOKING PLATFORM.
WE OFFER A VARIETY OF EUROPEAN TOURING
RESOURCES, INCLUDING HOTELS, TOURING COACHES, TOUR GUIDES,
ATTRACTION TICKETS, RESTAURANTS, ENTERTAINMENTS,
BUSINESS TRIP PLANS, OVERSEAS STUDY TOURS, ETC.
vice-desc:
With 8-year rich experiences in the European market,
we serve over 10,000 tour groups each year

appropriate services, including car rent
charged by the day, pick up and drop off

selected tour guides and drivers available

aboutUs.title: About us
desc:
Yohitrip is a subsidiary of Sichuan Haiwujiang Information Technology Limited Company, which is an overseas tourism B2B E-commerce technology company and
headquartered in Chengdu, Sichuan, China. Yohitrip is and outbound travel e-commerce B2B platform in preparation and has received 20 million venture investment.
Yohitrip is a young, energetic, and creative team, and is passionate in the travel carrier.

Our team members consist of previous employees from E-Bay, Sohu, Ctrip, Accenture and other big internet IT companies, tour technology companies and traditional
famous destination management companies
